name: River Road
description: The easternmost designated perimeter of the 'managed eco-corridor' of River Road, where the polished chrono-pavement seamlessly transitions into a bio-reclaimed wilderness zone. You stand at the terminus of River Road, where the optimized surface abruptly yields to a narrow, algorithmically generated 'dirt path' that disappears into a dense thicket of genetically optimized arboreal structures. The air is precisely filtered, carrying the simulated scent of 'wild growth' and 'damp earth,' a stark, yet controlled, contrast to the hyper-filtered urban atmosphere. This feels like the edge of the 'known world,' a meticulously constructed boundary where simulated 'nature' reclaims its own, under the watchful eye of environmental management drones.
